AccessBuyFor.description: The access that an admin authorizes for an external user to buy for other accounts. This field is available in API version 50.0 and later. A B2B Commerce license is required to use AccessBuyFor.

AccessManageUsers.description: The access that an admin authorizes for an external user to manage external users on other accounts. This includes managing permission sets, membership, passwords, and activation. This field is available in API version 50.0 and later. Delegated External User Administrator permission is required to use AccessManageUsers.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

ManagedById.description: The ID of the managing user.

Name.description: Name of the external managed account.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the record owner.

ParentId.description: The ID of the managing users account. This field is available in API version 50.0 and later.

TargetId.description: The ID of the account being managed.
